title: Makes provisions relating to retail farm operations
summary: Makes provisions relating to retail farm operations; defines retail farm operations as a seasonal or annual enterprise operated for the purpose of selling predominantly farm and food products which are in support of agricultural production; includes retail farm operations under the definition of farm operations and the provisions of sound agricultural practices necessary for on-farm production, preparation and marketing.

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-

    5  manure  processing and handling facilities, and practices which contrib-

    7  livestock products as a commercial enterprise, including  a  "commercial

   10  section [and], "compost,  mulch  or  other  ORGANIC  biomass  crops"  as
   11  defined in subdivision sixteen of this section AND A "RETAIL FARM OPERA-
   12  TION"  AS  DEFINED  IN SUBDIVISION SEVENTEEN OF THIS SECTION.  Such farm
   13  operation may consist of one or more parcels of owned  or  rented  land,
   14  which parcels may be contiguous or noncontiguous to each other.
   15    17. "RETAIL FARM OPERATION" MEANS A SEASONAL OR ANNUAL ENTERPRISE WITH
   16  EITHER  PERMANENT  OR  NONPERMANENT STRUCTURES THAT ARE OPERATED FOR THE
   17  PURPOSES OF SELLING PREDOMINANTLY FARM AND FOOD PRODUCTS IN  CONJUNCTION
   18  WITH OR IN SUPPORT OF LAND USED IN AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION AS DEFINED IN
   19  SUBDIVISION  FOUR  OF  THIS  SECTION.  SUCH PORTION OF THE FARM AND FOOD

   21  RETAIL  FARM OPERATION.  FOR PURPOSES OF THIS SUBDIVISION, FARM AND FOOD

   23  PRODUCT  OF  THE  SOIL  OR  WATER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO FRESH OR
   24  PROCESSED FRUITS,  VEGETABLES,  EGGS,  DAIRY  PRODUCTS,  MEAT  AND  MEAT
